sitename: Canton Chiropractor - Powell Chiropractic Clinic, Inc.
cleaned_text: Canton Chiropractors for More Than 50 Years [Dr. James Powell](/our-doctors/) and the [ team at Powell Chiropractic Clinic](/our-team/), Inc. have been changing patients' lives for more than four decades. With a blend of traditional chiropractic care and cutting edge therapies, [Powell Chiropractic Clinic](/about-us/), Inc. has helped families in Canton find relief from pain and achieve lasting wellness.
